summary.span: 扩展组件的设计模式行为。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的基本设计器类提供了一个简单的设计器，它可以在设计模式下扩展关联组件的行为。The base designer class provides a simple designer that can extend the behavior of an associated component in design mode. 提供了一个空的 接口实现，可以重写其方法，以便在设计时调整关联组件的属性、属性和事件。 provides an empty interface implementation, whose methods can be overridden to adjust the attributes, properties and events of the associated component at design time. 您可以使用 将设计器与类型相关联。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100))。For an overview of customizing design-time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100)). 类实现继承组件的属性说明符的特殊行为。The class implements a special behavior for the property descriptors of inherited components. 默认的 实现使用名为 `InheritedPropertyDescriptor` 的内部类型，以获取从基类继承的属性。An internal type named `InheritedPropertyDescriptor` is used by the default implementation to stand in for properties that are inherited from a base class. 在这两种情况下，将添加这些属性说明符。There are two cases in which these property descriptors are added. 1. 根对象本身，由 属性返回，因为你要从其基类继承。To the root object itself, which is returned by the property, because you are inheriting from its base class. 2. 到根对象的基类中的字段。To fields found in the base class of the root object. 基类中的公共和受保护字段将添加到设计器中，以便用户可以对其进行操作。Public and protected fields from the base class are added to the designer so that they can be manipulated by the user. `InheritedPropertyDescriptor` 类修改属性的默认值，以便默认值为对象实例化的当前值。The `InheritedPropertyDescriptor` class modifies the default value of a property, so that the default value is the current value at object instantiation. 这是因为该属性继承自另一个实例。This is because the property is inherited from another instance. 设计器定义重置属性值，将其设置为继承的类所设置的值。The designer defines resetting the property value as setting it to the value that was set by the inherited class. 此值可能不同于存储在元数据中的默认值。This value may differ from the default value stored in metadata. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了一个示例 实现和一个与设计器关联的示例组件。The following code example provides an example implementation and an example component associated with the designer. 设计器实现 方法的重写，该方法调用基 `Initialize` 方法、重写在双击该组件时显示 的 方法，以及将自定义 菜单命令提供给该组件的快捷菜单的 属性访问器的重写。The designer implements an override of the method that calls the base `Initialize` method, an override of the method that displays a when the component is double-clicked, and an override of the property accessor that supplies a custom menu command to the shortcut menu for the component. [!code-cpp[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/CPP/examplecomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/CS/examplecomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ComponentDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ComponentDesignerExample/VB/examplecomponent.vb#1)]

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support
How to: Access Design-time Services

summary.span: 获取与设计器所管理的组件关联的组件集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of components associated with the component managed by the designer.

value.span: 与设计器所管理的组件关联的组件。

span.span: The components that are associated with the component managed by the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在复制、拖动或移动操作期间要复制或移动设计器管理的组件的任何组件。This property indicates any components to copy or move along with the component managed by the designer during a copy, drag, or move operation. 如果此集合包含对当前设计模式文档中的其他组件的引用，则在复制操作过程中，这些组件将连同设计器管理的组件一起复制。If this collection contains references to other components in the current design mode document, those components will be copied along with the component managed by the designer during a copy operation. 选择设计器管理的组件时，将使用任何嵌套控件填充该集合。When the component managed by the designer is selected, this collection is filled with any nested controls. 此集合还可以包含其他组件，如工具栏按钮。This collection can also include other components, such as the buttons of a toolbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的 方法。The method of sets this property. > [!NOTE] > 重写 方法时，请确保在使用此属性之前调用基类 方法。When overriding the method, be sure to call the base class method before using this property.

summary.span: 释放 使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 在源代码文件中为组件的默认事件创建方法签名，并将用户的光标定位到该位置。

span.span: Creates a method signature in the source code file for the default event on the component and navigates the user's cursor to that location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 窗体和 Web 窗体设计器中，当用户双击组件时，将调用此方法。In Windows Forms and Web Forms designers, this method is invoked when a user double-clicks a component.

exception.span: 签出已签入源代码管理程序的文件的尝试失败。

span.span: An attempt to check out a file that is checked into a source code management program failed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在垃圾回收将对象回收之前，尝试通过调用 来释放资源。

span.span: Attempts to free resources by calling before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重写 ，并通过调用 `Dispose(false)`来清理资源。This method overrides and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`. 重写 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自定义清理。Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup. 应用程序代码不应调用此方法;在垃圾回收过程中会自动调用对象的 `Finalize` 方法，除非已通过调用 方法禁用了垃圾回收器终止。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))、[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现请求组件的站点中的服务。The default implementation of this method requests the service from the site of the component. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来访问设计器服务。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to access designer services. summary.span: 重新初始化现有组件。

span.span: Reinitializes an existing component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新初始化现有组件时，将调用 方法。The method is called when an existing component is being reinitialized. 例如，在用户将组件拖动到另一个容器后，可能会发生这种情况。For example, this may occur after the user drags a component to another container. 您可以使用 `defaultValues` 字典将推荐的默认值应用于属性;但是，除了字典中存储的组件属性之外，不应修改组件属性，因为此现有组件可能已设置了属性。You may use the `defaultValues` dictionary to apply recommended defaults to properties; however, you should not modify component properties aside from those stored in the dictionary, because this existing component may already have properties set on it. 此方法的默认实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

param.span: 要应用到属性的默认值的名称/值字典。

span.span: A name/value dictionary of default values to apply to properties.

param.span: 如果未指定默认值，可能为 。

span.span: May be if no default values are specified.

summary.span: 初始化新创建的组件。

span.span: Initializes a newly created component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次初始化组件时调用 方法，通常是先将其添加到设计图面。The method is called when a component is first initialized, typically after being first added to a design surface. 你可以执行此组件的任何必要的初始化，你可以完全忽略 `defaultValues` 字典。You may perform any necessary initialization of this component, and you may ignore the `defaultValues` dictionary altogether. 此方法的默认实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

summary.span: 对已初始化为非默认设置的导入组件的设置进行初始化。

span.span: Initializes the settings for an imported component that is already initialized to settings other than the defaults.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设计器与不处于其默认状态的控件关联时，将调用此方法，例如，使用拖放操作在设计器上粘贴或移动的控件。This method is called when the designer is associated with a control that is not in its default state, such as a control that you paste or move with a drag-and-drop operation onto the designer. 此方法为实现者提供了修改或隐藏组件属性的机会，而不是将组件的属性初始化为默认值。This method provides an opportunity for implementers to modify or shadow the properties of the component rather than initialize the properties for the component to their defaults. 在其他初始化函数后调用此方法。This method is called after the other initialization functions.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This method has been deprecated. Use InitializeNewComponent instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 设置组件的默认属性。

span.span: Sets the default properties for the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化设计器时调用 。 is called when the designer is initialized. 这使设计器可以为基本组件提供默认值。This allows the designer to provide default values for the base component. 此方法只调用一次：首次通过将组件从工具箱拖到设计图面来创建组件。This method is called only once: when you first create the component by dragging it from the Toolbox to the design surface. 以后对设计器的初始化不调用此方法。Subsequent initializations of the designer do not invoke this method. 此方法的默认实现将组件的默认属性设置为组件的名称（如果默认属性为字符串），并且该属性尚未设置。The default implementation of this method sets the default property of the component to the name of the component if the default property is a string and the property is not already set. 此方法可在派生类中实现，以自定义此设计器正在设计的组件的初始化。This method can be implemented in a derived class to customize the initialization of the component that this designer is designing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property ParentComponent As IComponent
protected: virtual property System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ ParentComponent { System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此设计器的父组件。

span.span: Gets the parent component for this designer.

value.span: 此设计器的父组件，或者如果此设计器为根组件，则为 。

span.span: The parent component for this designer, or if this designer is the root component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供了一种通用机制，用于在设计器中发现父关系，并由 对象的 接口实现使用。This property provides a generic mechanism for discovering parent relationships within designers, and is used by the object's interface implementation. 此属性应仅在此设计器为根组件时返回 `null`。This property should only return `null` when this designer is the root component. 此属性的默认实现返回非根组件的所有组件的根组件，并为根组件返回 `null`。The default implementation of this property returns the root component for all components that are not the root component, and it returns `null` for the root component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void PostFilterAttributes(class System.Collections.IDictionary attributes) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub PostFilterAttributes (attributes As IDictionary)
abstract member PostFilterAttributes : System.Collections.IDictionary -> unit override this.PostFilterAttributes : System.Collections.IDictionary -> unit

param.name: attributes
param.span: 组件的类的特性。

span.span: The attributes for the class of the component.

summary.span: 允许设计器从通过 公开的特性集中更改或移除项。

span.span: Allows a designer to change or remove items from the set of attributes that it exposes through a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了一种方法，用于更改或删除通过 公开的属性字典中的项。This method provides a way to change or remove the items within the dictionary of attributes that are exposed through a . 属性字典中的关键字是属性的类型标识符，这些标识符由其 属性的值指定。The keys in the dictionary of attributes are the type identifiers of the attributes, as specified by the value of their property. 对象的类型为 。The objects are of type . 在 方法之后立即调用此方法。This method is called immediately after the method.

para.span: 可以直接筛选可通过 参数访问的字典，也可以将其保持不变。

span.span: You can directly filter the dictionary that is accessible through the parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.

para.span: 如果重写此方法，请在执行您自己的筛选后调用基实现。

span.span: If you override this method, call the base implementation after you perform your own filtering.

para.span: 此外，不能删除 方法中的项。

span.span: In addition, you must not remove items in the method.

para.span: 而是更改属性以隐藏项。

span.span: Instead, change attributes to hide items.

para.span: 你还可以删除 方法中的项。

span.span: You may also remove items in the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void PostFilterEvents(class System.Collections.IDictionary events) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub PostFilterEvents (events As IDictionary)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提供了一种方法，用于在通过 公开的事件字典中更改或移除项。This method provides a way to change or remove the items within the dictionary of events that are exposed through a . 事件字典中的键是事件的名称。The keys in the dictionary of events are the names of the events. 对象的类型为 。The objects are of type . 在 方法之后立即调用此方法。This method is called immediately after the method.

para.span: 可以直接筛选可通过 参数访问的字典，也可以将其保持不变。

span.span: You can directly filter the dictionary that is accessible through the parameter, or you can leave it unchanged.

para.span: 如果重写此方法，请在执行您自己的筛选后调用基实现。

span.span: If you override this method, call the base implementation after you perform your own filtering.

para.span: 此外，不能删除 方法中的项。

span.span: In addition, you must not remove items in the method.

para.span: 而是更改属性以隐藏项。

span.span: Instead, change attributes to hide items.

para.span: 你还可以删除 方法中的项。

span.span: You may also remove items in the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Verbs As DesignerVerbCollection

summary.span: 获取与设计器相关联的组件所支持的设计时谓词。

span.span: Gets the design-time verbs supported by the component that is associated with the designer.

value.span: 对象的 ，在没有可用设计器谓词的情况下为 。

span.span: A of objects, or if no designer verbs are available.
This default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果组件没有设计时谓词，则此方法返回 `null`。This method returns `null` if the component has no design-time verbs. 设计时环境通常会在快捷方式（右键单击）菜单中显示此方法返回的谓词。The design-time environment typically displays verbs returned by this method in a shortcut (right-click) menu. 当用户选择其中一个谓词时，将调用相应 的 方法。When a user selects one of the verbs, the method of the corresponding is invoked. > [!NOTE] > 设计时环境通常在组件的快捷菜单上提供 "**属性**" 命令。A design-time environment typically provides a **Properties** command on a component's shortcut menu. 因此，请不要将此类项包含在设计器指定的谓词的集合中。Therefore, do not include such an entry in the collection of designer-specified verbs.
